Name: Healing Light
Description: Channel warm radiance to close wounds and steady an ally.

Level.Name: Healing Word
Level.Description: Speak a holy word that knits wounds from afar.
Level.EffectText: Target regains 1d6 + caster level HP.

Level.Name: Cure Wounds
Level.Description: Lay hands upon a creature to restore vitality.
Level.EffectText: Target regains 2d8 + caster level HP.

Level.Name: Bless
Level.Description: Imbue allies with divine favor.
Level.EffectText: Up to three allies gain +1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws.

Level.Name: Sanctuary
Level.Description: Ward a creature against attacks.
Level.EffectText: Attackers must succeed a Wits save (DC 12 + caster level) or choose a new target.

Level.Name: Guiding Bolt
Level.Description: Strike with radiant light that reveals the target.
Level.EffectText: Ranged spell attack deals 4d6 radiant damage; next attack against target gains advantage.

Level.Name: Turn Undead
Level.Description: Channel divine energy to repel undead.
Level.EffectText: Undead must make a Presence save (DC 13 + caster level) or flee for 2 rounds; damaged undead save again.

Level.Name: Prayer of Healing
Level.Description: Invoke a sustained prayer to mend several allies.
Level.EffectText: Up to six allies regain 3d8 + caster level HP.

Level.Name: Spiritual Weapon
Level.Description: Summon a floating spectral weapon to strike foes.
Level.EffectText: Create weapon that can attack each round dealing 1d8 + caster level force damage; moves 20 feet per round.

Level.Name: Lesser Restoration
Level.Description: Cure minor ailments and conditions.
Level.EffectText: End one disease or one of: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, poisoned.

Level.Name: Revivify
Level.Description: Return a fallen ally to life moments after death.
Level.EffectText: Restore life to a creature dead less than 1 minute; returns with 1 HP and suffers 1 level of exhaustion.

Level.Name: Spirit Guardians
Level.Description: Summon spirits that protect you and scour enemies.
Level.EffectText: Enemies entering or starting turn in area take 3d8 radiant damage and have speed halved; allies are unaffected.

Level.Name: Mass Heal
Level.Description: Pour divine energy into many allies at once.
Level.EffectText: Up to six allies regain 8d8 + caster level HP and are cured of blindness and deafness.

Level.Name: Divine Smite
Level.Description: Channel holy power into a weapon strike.
Level.EffectText: Next melee hit deals +2d8 radiant damage (+1d8 vs undead/demons).

Level.Name: Holy Light
Level.Description: Radiate a burst of holy illumination.
Level.EffectText: Bright light in a 20-foot radius; undead in light take 1d6 radiant damage each round.

Level.Name: Divine Shield
Level.Description: Summon a protective barrier of faith.
Level.EffectText: Gain +2 AC and reduce incoming damage by 1d4 for 3 rounds.

Level.Name: Purify Food and Drink
Level.Description: Cleanse food and water of poison and disease.
Level.EffectText: Render nonmagical food and drink within 10 feet free of poison and disease.

Level.Name: Shield of Faith
Level.Description: A shimmering field bolsters a creature's defenses.
Level.EffectText: Target gains +2 AC for 1 minute (concentration).

Level.Name: Spirit Link
Level.Description: Bind allies together so wounds are shared.
Level.EffectText: Up to four allies share damage; half damage taken by one is distributed evenly to others as radiant.

Level.Name: Divine Fortress
Level.Description: Erect a bastion of radiant protection.
Level.EffectText: Allies in aura gain +3 AC and heal 2d6 HP at start of turn; enemies take 2d6 radiant when entering.

Level.Name: Divine Intervention
Level.Description: Plea for a deity's immediate aid.
Level.EffectText: Request a miracle; the GM chooses an appropriate divine effect based on your deity and need.

Effect: Target gains damage reduction 1d4 for 3 rounds; reduction scales to 1d6 at caster level 6.

Name: Despair
Effect: Up to three enemies suffer -1 to attack and defense rolls for 1 minute (Will save negates).

Name: Invoke Terror
Description: Unleash nightmarish whispers that shatter morale.
Effect: Creatures must pass a Will save (DC 10 + caster level) or flee in panic for 2 rounds.

Name: Void Lash
Description: Manifest a whip of hungry darkness.
Effect: Deals 1d8 necrotic damage, increasing by 1d8 every two caster levels above 1.

Name: Sow Sickness
Description: Imbue a victim with virulent blight.
Effect: Target must save (DC 12 + caster level) or suffer poisoned condition and 1d4 immediate necrotic damage.

Name: Veil of Dread
Description: Shroud an ally in terrifying shadow.
Effect: Enemies must succeed a Will save (DC 12 + caster level) to target the warded ally; failure forces a different target.

Name: Shadowstorm
Description: Explode a storm of necrotic shards.
Effect: Enemies in a 20-foot radius take 3d8 necrotic damage (save DC 14 + caster level for half).

Name: Soul Siphon
Description: Drain life from a foe to heal yourself.
Effect: Deal 4d6 + caster level necrotic damage; caster regains health equal to damage dealt.

Name: Cloak of Shadows
Description: Wrap an ally in obscuring gloom.
Effect: Target gains +2 AC for 5 rounds and can attempt Stealth even when observed.

Name: Command Undead
Description: Bend undead wills through dread oaths.
Effect: Dominate up to three lesser undead for 5 rounds; disobedience deals 2d6 necrotic backlash to them.

Name: Death Pulse
Description: Radiate a surge of negative energy.
Effect: Living enemies take 2d8 necrotic damage (save for half) while undead allies heal the same amount.

Name: Dark Bargain
Description: Appeal to a shadow patron for fleeting power.
Effect: On success (DC 15 + caster level) gain advantage on all rolls for 1 minute; spell ends with 1d6 psychic damage as payment.

Name: Raise Revenant
Description: Return a soul bound to undeath.
Effect: Revive a fallen ally as a sentient undead with 50% health; if within 1 hour, they return fully healed but gain radiant vulnerability.

Name: Nightmare Stalker
Effect: Summoned stalker attacks twice per round for 2d10 necrotic damage and may become incorporeal to intercept one attack per round.

Name: Ray of Void
Description: Fire a beam of annihilating darkness.
Effect: Deals 6d8 necrotic damage and dispels magical light within 60 feet.

Name: Tendrils of the Abyss
Effect: Create three tendrils that each deal 4d10 bludgeoning and necrotic damage; targets may make a Dex save for half.

Name: Desecrated Ground
Effect: Enemies in a 20-foot radius suffer -3 AC and 2d6 necrotic damage per round; undead gain advantage on attacks while inside.

Name: Doom
Description: Invoke inevitable demise on a single foe.
Effect: Deal 8d10 necrotic damage (save DC 18 + caster level for half); if the target dies, their soul is trapped and cannot be resurrected for 24 hours.
